BDN_messy_artist.name: 杂乱艺术家
BDN_messy_artist.memory: It's okay if you don't know what you are doing yet. We all have to start by learning first.
BDN_messy_artist.card: 全元素的|L|分散心心射击

BDN_forgetful.name: 健忘
BDN_forgetful.memory: What if I forget everything again? What will happen then? Who else can solve this? Is it really just me?|L|Is it getting harder to breathe?|L|...|L||L|Breathe slowly. You know exactly what this is. Everything will be okay.

BDN_defective.name: 缺陷
BDN_defective.memory: It's broken just like Mother's heart. This should be an easy one to take. This is far too easy for me really.

BDN_irreparable.name: 无法修复
BDN_irreparable.memory: I can fix this.|L|I can fix this.|L|I can fix this.|L|No matter how many times it takes!|L||L|Why is it getting harder?
BDN_irreparable.card: 生命缓慢流失，|L|但连击会使你回复

BDN_personal_space.name: 个人空间
BDN_personal_space.memory: Are... you sure I have to get that close? But what if they don't like it? I'm just going to back away now.|L||L||shake|Oh, she's approaching me now.|norm|

BDN_dissociation.name: 解离
BDN_dissociation.card: 无法发射|L|任何基础子弹|L|1个交叉双子

BDN_clipped.name: 剪断
BDN_clipped.memory: You know what they say, "An eye for an eye is a good trade and you should always seek vengeance." Ha! I couldn't get her wing, but at least MY eye can still see.
BDN_clipped.card: [VAL1]点燃烧生命|L|（战斗后燃烧|L|[VAL4]点更多）

BDN_cycle_of_pain.name: 苦痛循环
BDN_cycle_of_pain.memory: I'll make them all pay for this! I don't know how, but I'm going to get back up there with an army of these monsters.
BDN_cycle_of_pain.card: 在所有射击类型间|L|循环

BDN_singed_scar.name: 焦燃伤痕
BDN_singed_scar.card: 燃烧防御-[VAL1]|L|[VAL2] 点燃烧生命

BDN_scrambla.memory: We will chase you and you will run. Just like all da others. Everyone run away.|L||L|Everyone always runs away.

BDN_shy_scrambla.memory: Don't look for us. We don't want to be seen. We are ugly!
BDN_shy_scrambla.card: 获得[VAL1]个负担帮手，|L|触碰她们会受伤！

BDN_boiler.memory: Stay away from us or we will burn you! Please, dis one can't burn another.|L||L|We are so tired of burning.

BDN_rage_boiler.memory: Dis one can't control the fire. There is too much! There is infinite fire! Stay away.

BDN_knot_knott.memory: Are you trying to take our wife away from us? Stay away. We don't need you here!

BDN_shiny_knots.memory: Our other half is gone.|L|She has finally had enough of us! We are never going to see our wife again. She is gone for good this time!
BDN_shiny_knots.card: 最大生命被减半！|L|全回复

BDN_blot.memory: Don't look at us like this! We have no colors, but everything must color! Without colors, we are worthless.
BDN_blot.card: 全防御-[VAL1]|L|失去当前生命的[VAL6]%

BDN_alter_blot.memory: Our colors are ugly. It hurts us to see what our colors have become. We don't want you to see us this way!

BDN_null_blot.memory: We've forgotten why we even want to live anymore. Nothing we do is right. Just leave us alone, we don't even want to move. Just let the rain wash us away.
BDN_null_blot.card: 怪物失忆症|L|怪物恐惧不再可见

BDN_amalga.memory: Are you going to hurt us too? Are you going to take more from us? We won't let you! No one can take any more from us!
BDN_amalga.card: 无法看到|L|你自己的生命

BDN_calorie.memory: We are so tired and can't focus on anything. We can only burn, but we don't want to burn her. We must keep her away from us.

BDN_joule.memory: She has so much and we have so little. We are tired of living this way. We will take all of her power!
BDN_joule.card: 破坏部位能量-[VAL1]%|L|充能速度-[VAL2]%

BDN_shiny_joule.memory: It seems she doesn't always tell us about our forgotten memories. We can understand the variability of monster reactions from day to day. This must be one of our good days. Perhaps we can send this energy to other Joules that need it more today. We'll do what we can to help!
BDN_shiny_joule.card: 开始战斗时没有能量|L|充能速度-[VAL2]%

BDN_emerald.memory: So this is the feeling of shame? It is a powerful social tool for correcting harmful behavior, but it has been used incorrectly on you. You can't correct your wings, and the ones who made you feel this way should be feeling shame instead.
BDN_emerald.card: [VAL1]个创伤之心|L|（受击减少1点|L|最大生命）

BDN_shamra.memory: What are we?|L|We? Why did I say it like that? Why did we say it like what? Why are there so many of me? Us. We are so afraid.
BDN_shamra.card: [VAL1]个创伤之心|L|（受击减少1点|L|最大生命）

BDN_rendy.memory: Please stay away.|L|Don't hurt Rendy.|L|Rendy will bite!|L|Please, please stay away.

BDN_shiny_rendy.memory: She is going to be so impressed by how fast Rendy can dig... Wait, where did Rendy bury the treasure?

BDN_snowball.memory: Royal army, thou shalt protect Her Majesty from this- Ugh, I forgot that I'm all alone.
BDN_snowball.card: 你的子弹具有重力|L|子弹速度-[VAL2]%

BDN_shiny_snowball.memory: I practiced this speech all day. She is going to be so impressed and give me lots of cuddles! Now, where did I bury that treasure?
BDN_shiny_snowball.card: 你的子弹具有重力|L|子弹速度+[VAL2]%

BDN_roundsaw.memory: Roundsaw will cut!|L|Roundsaw is serious!|L|Roundsaw really mean it!|L|One more step-|L|Okay, now one step-

BDN_alter_roundsaw.memory: Come to Roundsaw if you dare!|L|A hug not going to stop this monster!|L|But you can try!|L||L|...You will try, yes?

BDN_null_roundsaw.memory: Come to Roundsaw if you dare.|L|Or don't.|L|Roundsaw not care anyways.|L||L|...Roundsaw cares a little.
BDN_null_roundsaw.card: 暴击率-[VAL1]%|L|暴击伤害-[VAL2]%|L|虚空防御-[VAL3]

BDN_lila.memory: Ish focus.|L|Send the ghosts.|L|Make me look scary.|L||L|She smells of sweet fruit!

BDN_shy_lila.card: 获得[VAL1]个负担帮手，|L|碰到她们会受伤！

BDN_sandrome.memory: You must go away.|L|There is no reason for a Zaraden to come to me.|L|I can only take space.|L|I can only stab! Stab!
BDN_sandrome.card: [VAL1]个阻挡你的子弹的|L|阻碍帮手！

BDN_voladrome.memory: There is no reason for a Zaraden to come to lava. I will make traps to scare Zaraden away.|L||L|Maybe these are too dangerous? No, LAVA is too dangerous!

BDN_shanx.memory: Darling, are you really approaching me? Take a good look at me from down there. I tower over you. Doesn't that frighten you?|L|At all?

BDN_alter_shanx.memory: |shake|Ahhhhhhhhhh!|norm||L||L|No, I am not afraid of the lightning. Me? Afraid of something silly like that? Don't be preposterous. I was merely trying to scare you away, darling. Did it work?
BDN_alter_shanx.card: 电击恐慌|L|每30秒恐慌一次

BDN_ruby.memory: So this is the feeling of frustration? It feels very painful, but it can also be used as a fuel to take action and change the situation. So long as it's kept under control. Be very careful with this one.

BDN_guardian_soul.memory: Where should I go? Why am I asking that? I need to go somewhere. But where do I need to go? And why?

BDN_photoxai.memory: No no! You should stay away from me. I will blind you! I can only admire you from far away. I refuse to hurt your pretty eyes.

BDN_dendrohai.memory: I am a waste of time. You should spend that time doing something more efficient. Anything else is better than spending time with me! I can only waste your time.
BDN_dendrohai.card: [VAL1]个创伤之心|L|（受击减少1点|L|最大生命）

BDN_hematoren.memory: I am your worst nightmare! I can drain all your life away! I can do it so quickly and it will hurt!|L||L|Why are you still coming towards me?
BDN_hematoren.card: [VAL1]个流血之心|L|失去连击时|L|流血[VAL3]生命

BDN_ombroah.memory: This is all my fault. I am the reason it never stops raining. Just leave me alone here to rot. I deserve it.
BDN_ombroah.card: 创造一个|L|阻挡你的子弹的帮手

BDN_lavalin.memory: It's not safe to be near me. Please, stay away from me. Don't make me move! I don't know what will happen, but it's never good.
BDN_lavalin.card: 每场战斗后|L|随机负担效果

BDN_heliola.memory: Didn't they ever tell you not to look directly at the sun? All of you are always looking at me! Get away from me. I can only hurt you.

BDN_chemory.memory: I am dirty.|L|I am filthy.|L|These fumes are disgusting.|L|They will bond to you.|L|They will ruin you too.|L|Don't get anywhere near me!

BDN_hadesoh.memory: So, are you here to take your anger out on me? Admit it! You just want to hurt me. It will feel so good, won't it? Well then, bring it on!
BDN_hadesoh.card: 获得4个具有|L|独特负担的帮手

BDN_chionotoh.memory: The sharp icicles weren't enough to scare her away. She is still coming this way. Well, there's nothing left to do except cry. My tears hurt so much as they freeze to my face. Maybe she won't try to hurt me if I'm already hurt.

BDN_astrayo.memory: No!|L|No. No. No. No. No. No. No. No.|L|No. No. No. No. Nope.|L|Those heart stones are not for you!|L|No, I don't know why they came out. No, I don't know why they keep appearing when you get closer. Just don't touch them!
BDN_astrayo.card: 无法蓄力，|L|但是基础子弹变大

BDN_monovai.memory: I am made to be alone forever. If you come any closer, then I will not be alone. The consequences of this are severe and unknowable. If you proceed, I will be forced to seek retribution.
BDN_monovai.card: 获得[VAL1]个没有作用的|L|填充帮手

BDN_philolu.memory: Ouch! Rejected!|L|This does not feel so good. She's so sweet and cute too! I really wasn't expecting that. It seems that her heart still belongs to someone else. I never had a shot.|L||L|It's okay! Our friendly date will be fun anyways. Sigh...

BDN_topaz.memory: So this is the feeling of denial? It is a powerful defense from suffering overwhelming emotions. However, this shield must eventually come down in order to resolve the source of those emotions. Are you ready to handle them?

BDN_oudenai.memory: Who am I? I have lost my identity. Did I ever have one? Am I no one? I must be someone. I can't be no one, because I am. But who am I?

BDN_unit_lulu.memory: //Wingless Zaraden is approaching|L|//Initiating Tutorial Mode|L|Attempt 147|L|Loading: How_To_Love_A.tut|L|Loading: Existential_Dread.prog|L||L|Randomized Lutekna Quote:|L|//Never stop trying, Lulu. Make those monsters love someone!
BDN_unit_lulu.card: 你的生命与怪物恐惧|L|不再可见

BDN_null_unit.memory: //This action will delete files|L|//Are you sure?|L|//Yeah, just do it.|L|[Deleting Files]|L|Error: Permission Denied|L|//Ugh. Come on.|L||L|//This will initiate a full shutdown|L|//Are you sure?|L|//Yeah, I guess.|L|[Shutting Down]|L|Error: Permission Denied
BDN_null_unit.card: 所有礼物与怪物|L|变为未知

BDN_prisma.memory: //Prisma must open shell to determine threat level|L|[Open Shell]|L|//Zaraden sighted|L|[Close Shell]|L|Fear Rating: 4,175|L||L|//Prisma will hold still and keep shell closed
BDN_prisma.card: 随机宽广分散射击|L|过度专注

BDN_rage_prisma.memory: //Zaraden is in close proximity|L|[Close Shell]|L|//Temperature Warning!|L|//Recommended Action: Open Shell|L||L|//Temperature Warning!|L|//Temperature Warning!|L|//Self preservation system overwriting actions|L|[Open Shell]

BDN_dual_prisma.memory: [Distress signal received]|L|Sender: Prisma-02|L|[Activating distress signal]|L|[Distress signal received]|L|Sender: Prisma-02|L|[Activating distress signal]|L|[Distress signal received]|L|Sender: Prisma-02|L|[Activating distress signal]

BDN_syncron.memory: [Distress signal received]|L|Sender: Syncron-02|L|//Intruder detected|L|//Potential tower zone-0232|L|[Activating distress signal]|L|//Syncron-01 will activate Panic Mode in:|L|//30|L|//29|L|//28
BDN_syncron.card: 每场战斗30秒后|L|自动恐慌

BDN_alter_syncron.memory: //Wingless Zaraden detected|L|[Distress signal received]|L|Sender: Syncron-02|L|//Activate the flamethrower|L||L|[Message received]|L|Sender: Syncron-02|L|//Suggestion: Let her love you|L|//Syncron-02 must be compromised|L|[Activating Panic Mode]
BDN_alter_syncron.card: 自动恐慌，|L|但会迟延一步

BDN_shiny_syncron.memory: //Motes detected in exhaust port-03|L|//Clog detected in port-03|L|[Activating distress signal]|L|//Reply received from Syncron-01|L|//What is wrong?|L|//Clog detected in port-04|L|//Clog detected in port-05|L|[Activating Panic Mode]

BDN_flip_flap.memory: [Pure Affection Detected]|L|Fear Rating: 5,724|L|//These Units must activate full defense|L|//This Unit agrees|L|//Armor at 100%|L|//Wire at 50%|L|//This must be enough or there is no hope
BDN_flip_flap.card: 获得[VAL1]个没有作用的|L|填充帮手

BDN_sentinel_4x.memory: //Intruder detected|L|//Potential tower zone-0673|L|[Activate Power Claw]|L|[Activate Cleansing Claw]|L|//You may not proceed

BDN_sentinel_0x.memory: //Wingless Zaraden detected|L|Threat level: --------|L|Error: Boundless value|L|[Activate Positive Claw]|L|[Activate Negative Claw]|L|//Marked for deletion
BDN_sentinel_0x.card: 所有挑战更难|L|且有更多挑战

BDN_ventra.memory: //Zaraden--- sighted|L|Error: Legs unresponsive|L|Error: Left Weapon disconnected|L|Right Weapon -----------|L|Error: -----|L|//---- Zaraden threat 999999|L|//This Unit--- gives up

BDN_sapphire.memory: So this is the feeling of anxiety? This feeling is meant to protect you. It makes you take a cautious approach to unknown danger. It seems the world has given you far too many reasons to feel this way.
BDN_sapphire.card: [VAL1]个压力之心|L|（失去所有生命|L|然后缓慢回复）

BDN_default.card: [VAL1]个压力之心|L|（失去所有生命|L|然后缓慢回复）

BDN_dot.memory: I don't need you here.|L|I am perfectly balanced as I am.|L|Everything is perfect.|L|You will only mess it up for me.
BDN_dot.card: 最大生命被减半！|L|+[VAL2]玻璃之心

BDN_glacia.memory: My petals are all cracked. If she comes any closer I'll have to move. That will break me.
BDN_glacia.card: 1个压力之心|L|（失去所有生命|L|然后缓慢回复）

BDN_alter_glacia.memory: I want to be alone!|L|(No I don't)|L|Stay away from me!|L|(Please, come closer. I'm so cold.)
BDN_alter_glacia.card: 全防御-[VAL1]|L|失去当前生命的[VAL6]%

BDN_null_glacia.memory: I don't want to move.|L|Just come here and shatter me.|L||L|I'm already broken anyways.
BDN_null_glacia.card: 将你所有的生命|L|变为后备生命

BDN_vitrea.memory: That Zaraden is coming over here? No, I won't fall for this trick. She wants to break me. Well, I won't let her.

BDN_alter_vitrea.memory: I want to talk to that Zaraden. No, she would just tell me to be quiet and break me.|L||L|She saw me.|L|I'll probably never get to see the stars again.

BDN_rage_duet.memory: "I don't want to see you!"|L|"I don't want to see you either!"|L|"Then why are you here?"|L|"I'm hiding from that Zaraden."|L|"I am too!"|L|"Well, you're doing it very LOUDLY as usual!"|L|"Shhh... And she found us. Thanks a lot!"

BDN_pearl.memory: I really, really hope my face looks so menacing right now. Oh, who am I kidding? This would never scare her away.
BDN_pearl.card: 无法使用恐慌攻击|L|光耀防御-[VAL2]

BDN_momo.memory: Keep her away from me! I don't want her to see me. I'm so embarrassing to look at.

BDN_shy_momo.memory: Don't look at me! I've sent all the Murder Blossoms away. No one should ever see me again.

BDN_shiny_momo.memory: Wait no! Don't tell her that!|L|Okay, Momo. You can do this.|L|Just ask her to dance with you. No, maybe I shouldn't.

BDN_kiwi.memory: It's the pale Zaraden lady.|L|Shush, she will hear us.|L|She already heard us. She is coming over here.|L|Is she going to scream and try to hit us? We were good girls. We stayed away from towers.|L||L|Don't cry little sisters, Big Sister will scare her away.

BDN_citrine.memory: So this is the feeling of insecurity? As if you are not enough. As if you could lose everything at any moment. It causes you to grab anything dear to you, and grip it tightly. You have not been convinced that you are always enough, no matter how many times you hear it. Is that why you share love with others so easily? So they don't feel like you do?
BDN_citrine.card: [VAL1]个流血之心|L|（受击会|L|流血4点生命）

BDN_echo.memory: Who are you? Are you safe or are you dangerous? Who are you? Are you the one who will hurt me? Who are you? Are you the one who will break me? Who are you?
BDN_echo.card: [VAL1]个流血之心|L|（受击会|L|流血4点生命）

BDN_split_veyeral.memory: She is lonely, like us. She will join all of us as nothing.

BDN_burning_veyeral.memory: You are lacking in warmth. You can join me in burning. Take your place inside the fire with me.

BDN_voltage_veyeral.memory: You are lacking in light. You can join me in darkness. Being exposed in the light is a thing to be feared.
BDN_voltage_veyeral.card: 过载[VAL1]生命|L|使用蓄力射击以减少

BDN_venom_veyeral.memory: You are lacking in touch. You can join me in misery. It is so much easier to feel pain.

BDN_vibrant_veyeral.memory: You are lacking in color. You can join me in dullness. No amount of color can fix you.
BDN_vibrant_veyeral.card: 无法使用|L|任何蓄力攻击|L|全防御-[VAL2]

BDN_veyeral_quartet.memory: No matter what she says to us, we know we are still nothing. We will make sure she joins us together as nothing.

BDN_veyeral_rain.memory: She is vulnerable. There is nowhere for her to shelter. She will join us as nothing.
BDN_veyeral_rain.card: 能够穿过屏幕的|L|重力子弹

BDN_shiny_veyerals.memory: Sleeping is terrifying for us. There is only vulnerability and darkness. But we could see our dreams with her. We are safe with her.

BDN_storm_veyeral.memory: Stay away from me! I can do nothing but cause pain. I should always be alone for what I've done!
BDN_storm_veyeral.card: 每20%恐惧过载[VAL1]生命|L|连击治疗

BDN_molten_veyeral.memory: More!|L|More!|L|I need more!|L|I will take it all from you. I will never return to a lack of warmth.

BDN_amethyst.memory: So this is the feeling of loneliness? The purpose of this feeling is to let you know when to seek companionship and comfort from another. But if there is no one else around, this becomes a deadly poison. You are not made to feel this for very long.
BDN_amethyst.card: 成为恐慌的一团糟|L|+[VAL1]恐慌

BDN_forma.memory: Why am I? Why am I here? Why am I this? I am made for something. Why was I made? I was made to fill a void, but I can't leave my container. I was made to be alone.
BDN_forma.card: 成为恐慌的一团糟|L|+[VAL1]恐慌

BDN_the_void.memory: Just as you said, the pale one has come here to give me her heart.|L|"She is dangerous. She has been here many times before. She is very powerful."|L|So, does she not want to give it to me? I can't take anything that isn't given to me.|L|"She wants to give it to you! She's just very stubborn about it!"
BDN_the_void.card: 怪物恐惧不再可见|L|虚空防御-[VAL2]

BDN_totaria.memory: I'm taking over now! I'm going to take her heart!|L|"You don't know what you are doing. You're going to ruin it like the others."|L|I need it! I need to fix the hearts we've taken. I need to fix my beloved! And it's the only way I can keep her from |shake|killing me!|norm|
BDN_totaria.card: 无法看到自己的生命|L|燃烧防御-[VAL2]

BDN_blue_veyeral.memory: Anything less than perfection is unacceptable. Without perfection, you are nothing. Without perfection, I am nothing.

BDN_anomaly.memory: I am bound by the rules of this universe. If it must be something, then at least I can do this for you.

BDN_shiny_anomaly.memory: There is only so much I can do to bend the rules. I can only hope this was more of a blessing than a burden this time.
BDN_shiny_anomaly.card: 无法恐慌，|L|但每场战斗会获得1个

BDN_stella.memory: They've taken the sunlight from you. Make them burn for this. Sunburn upon them all.
BDN_stella.card: 每场战斗后|L|[VAL1]点燃烧生命

BDN_celestia.memory: They've taken the moonlight from you. Take it back from them. Cold night upon them all.
BDN_celestia.card: [VAL1]点光耀生命|L|结束战斗以清除

BDN_unity.memory: Your kind has forsaken you. You do not belong. You are something other.

BDN_chroma.memory: Be very afraid. All the light in the world is not enough to fend off this fear. Behold my radiance! Everything is darkness before me.

BDN_duality.memory: Fire and ice collide inside your mind. We'll see it in your dreams. It leaves a throbbing pain behind your face. We know the agony you are feeling. Push your fingers into your eyes. It's the only thing that slowly stops the ache.

BDN_trinity.memory: Zaraden girl, you are so devoid of color. Let us share our fear with you. You will know every color of fear.
BDN_trinity.card: 每场战斗后|L|[VAL1]个随机负担效果

BDN_nix_polyps.memory: Please help us.|L|Please love us.|L|We need you.|L|We are scared.|L|Please!|L|I need your help.|L|I don't know how to help us.
BDN_nix_polyps.card: 每30秒以及受击后|L|恐慌一次

BDN_tox_polyps.memory: She can help us.|L|She will help us.|L|Stick to her.|L|Bond with her love.|L|We need it more than her.

BDN_nova.memory: Shame, frustration, denial, anxiety, insecurity, loneliness.|L|What are these feelings like to a Zaraden that was abandoned as a child? How did they grow as she became an adult?
